name: Pop it Rocket
description:
Rocket jump around a sandbox level and blow up things! Slow down time mid-air to land trickshots on giant cubes!

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space or left click to shoot

Right click or Lshift to slow time

R to reload

Shoot beneath you when on the ground to boost yourself in the air to rocket jump. Shoot down giant cubes and watch them explode, idk

There is an arena area where you can kill beans for hours or you can go and complete the new level, do whatever you want
